findings.title: _approve
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transfer functions, including _transferStandard, _transferBothExcluded, and others.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: The transferFrom functionality allows non-whitelisted wallets to transfer a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as External and has no access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: The burn function can be exploited to drain tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap function.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Sync Reentrancy Vulnerability
findings.description: The contract has a reentrancy vulnerability due to the usage of sync.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: _burn
findings.description: Internal burn function

findings.title: deliver
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function does not check if the address is excluded from reward.

findings.title: Unprotected Function 'includeInReward'
findings.description: The function 'includeInReward' has been declared as public and can be accessed by anyone, which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The 'isExcludedFromFee' function allows an address to be excluded from fee.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludedFromMaxTxAmount
findings.description: The excludedFromMaxTxAmount function allows an address to be excluded from maximum transaction amount restrictions.

findings.title: includeInMaxTxAmount
findings.description: The 'includeInMaxTxAmount' function allows an address to be included in max transaction amount, which may lead to unintended consequences if not properly validated.

findings.title: excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount
findings.description: The function excludedFromExternalTokenMinAmount allows excluding addresses from external token minimum amount, which can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: includeInExternalTokenMinAmount
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludedFromAntiWhale
findings.description: The excludedFromAntiWhale function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: includeInAntiWhale
findings.description: The includeInAntiWhale function has been declared as public and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unintended consequences.
